parameters.content:
## Note
This was saved to save the IF & HTTP PUT nodes

article.body:
Joshua Wowk | Sys Admin | HPNE | 401-349-5153

Click here to book time with me
From: Raud Jean-Louis <raud.jeanlouis@hp-ne.com>
Sent: Friday, May 12, 2023 2:38 PM
To: Maisam Dadgar <Maisam.Dadgar@hp-ne.com>; Joshua Wowk <Joshua.Wowk@hp-ne.com>; Lynford Harris <Lynford.Harris@hp-ne.com>
Subject: RE: Computer Issues

Hi all,

 

I agree. It makes perfect sense to wait until after the upgrade on Monday.

 

Raud Jean-Louis

IT Manager

High Purity New England | HP-NE.com

2 Thurber Blvd, Smithfield, RI 02917

E: raud.jeanlouis@hp-ne.com | O: 401.349.5248

ISO 9001:2015 Certification 157603-2014-AQ-USA-ANAB

 

From: Maisam Dadgar <Maisam.Dadgar@hp-ne.com>
Sent: Friday, May 12, 2023 2:19 PM
To: Joshua Wowk <Joshua.Wowk@hp-ne.com>; Lynford Harris <Lynford.Harris@hp-ne.com>; Raud Jean-Louis <raud.jeanlouis@hp-ne.com>
Subject: RE: Computer Issues

 

Hi Josh,

 

It makes sense to look at it after the 2021 upgrade.

 

Maisam

 

From: Joshua Wowk <Joshua.Wowk@hp-ne.com>
Sent: Friday, May 12, 2023 2:08 PM
To: Maisam Dadgar <Maisam.Dadgar@hp-ne.com>; Lynford Harris <Lynford.Harris@hp-ne.com>; Raud Jean-Louis <raud.jeanlouis@hp-ne.com>
Subject: Re: Computer Issues

 

Hey Maisam, been working with Lynford the past hour to pin down what's going on. I need to spend additional time to research the issue and determine the cause here. That said, there's a number of things that could be resolved, or at the very least changed, with Monday's SolidWorks 2021 upgrade so I'm weary of dedicating additional time today for this. Please share any thoughts on this you may have.

 

I have some additional information to share as well. I'll send all I have when I return from lunch, which I'm leaving for now.

 

Thanks.

 

 

 

Joshua Wowk | Sys Admin | HPNE | 401-349-5153

From: Maisam Dadgar <Maisam.Dadgar@hp-ne.com>
Sent: Friday, May 12, 2023 1:07:40 PM
To: Lynford Harris <Lynford.Harris@hp-ne.com>; Raud Jean-Louis <raud.jeanlouis@hp-ne.com>; Joshua Wowk <Joshua.Wowk@hp-ne.com>
Subject: RE: Computer Issues

 

Definitely an urgent request here

 

From: Lynford Harris <Lynford.Harris@hp-ne.com>
Sent: Friday, May 12, 2023 10:30 AM
To: Raud Jean-Louis <raud.jeanlouis@hp-ne.com>; Joshua Wowk <Joshua.Wowk@hp-ne.com>
Cc: Maisam Dadgar <Maisam.Dadgar@hp-ne.com>
Subject: Computer Issues

 

Good Morning All,

 

I just wanted to inform you that I have been having some major computer issues, for the last few weeks. I have talked to Josh about a few of them and seem isolated to my laptop. They are rather sporadic but do tend to interrupt workflow when they happen.

 

Some of the issues are:

  • PDM not loading when computer is turned on in the morning for at least 45 mins (always loads in teams though for some strange reason).
  • The computer crashing randomly if not turned off overnight.
  • Solidworks unable to save.
  • Unable to save documents as pdf.

 

I have attached a few screenshots to depict these issues. Please let me know if there is any more clarification needed, and if there is anything that could be done as well.

 

Kind Regards,

Lynford Harris

Mechanical Design Engineer

High Purity New England | HP-NE.com

2 Thurber Blvd, Smithfield, RI 02917

E: lynford.harris@hp-ne.com

ISO 9001:2015 Certification 157603-2014-AQ-USA-ANAB
